article.title: The JCMT Gould Belt Survey: A First Look at IC 5146

choices: The location of known protostars within IC 5146.
The distribution of dense gas and dust within IC 5146 at 850 µm.
A comparison of the total flux and local surface densities of the clumps in IC 5146.
The Jeans stability ratio for all 96 clumps.

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of star is marked with a black star in the left panel?
What does the blue line in the figure represent?
choices: The distribution of the extinction-derived mass from the Cambr´esy extinction map.
The distribution of the submillimetre-derived mass from the 850 µm SCUBA-2 map.
The cumulative distribution of Class 0/I YSOs as a function of extinction.
The cumulative distribution of Class III YSOs as a function of extinction.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the main assumption made in Equation 2 to calculate the mass from submillimeter flux density?
choices: The dust temperature is constant throughout the cloud.
The dust emissivity is constant throughout the cloud.
